{{Wireless embedded system |brand=WRTnode |model=(MT7620N) |revision=v0.2 (EE) |asin=B019PNFMZA |price=25 |est_release_date=10/2014 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=mini module, IoT board |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=Micro USB |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620N |cpu1_cspeed=600 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FV |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Elixir |ram1_model=N2TU51216DG-AC |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 (pins) |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620N |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=5 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;3.10.44; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|WRTnode 1 IoT Board (MT7620N)}} :[http://wrtnode.com/sale.html Product page] {{•}} [http://wrtnode.com/demo.html WRTnode Demo] :[http://wrtnode.cc/html/hardware_1.html Tech Specs] {{•}} [http://wiki.wrtnode.com/index.php?title=Main_Page WRTnode 1 Wiki]
[[WRTnode (MT7620N)]] v0.2 • [http://cn.wrtnode.com/w/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/WRTnode_sch_v01.pdf Schematic] *CPU: [[MediaTek MT7620N]] @600MHz (MIPS 24KEc) :SoC Type: MT7620N (ver:2 eco:6 RevID:0206) *Flash: ''Winbond'' W25Q128FV 16MB (SPI SOIC8) :or ''Macronix'' MX25L12805D 16MB (SPI SOIC8) *RAM: ''Elixir'' N2TU51216DG-AC 64MB (DDR2) *WLAN: WiSoC 2T2R 802.11bgn (2.4GHz) *Pins: USB 2.0, 5x Port PHY, SPI, JTAG, :UART Lite, 23x GPIO • [http://wrtnode.cc/html/hardware_1.html Spec.]
===Reviews=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2014/09/18/wrtnode-quick-start-guide/ ''WRTnode'' on '''CNX-Software'''] *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2015/08/17/wrtnode2p-wrtnode2r-and-wrtnodehi-openwrt-boards-to-feature-m-2-mini-pcie-edge-connectors-h-265-camera-support-and-more/ ''WRTnode Boards'' on '''CNX-Software''']
